channel.title: CircuitBrains on Kevin Neubauer
channel.description: Recent content in CircuitBrains on Kevin Neubauer

item.title: Hacked See 'N Say Toy
item.description: Intro Listen to your intuition, especially when an idea comes to you out of nowhere and isn’t related to work in any shape or fashion. It may not make any sense at all, but hear me out and follow it (provided it doesn’t have a high probability of bodily harm). In these instances, your brain is telling you that you need to do something different, something fun, and perhaps something creative.
item.dc:creator: Kevin Neubauer
